en.description: Working on developing and deploying machine learning models for real-world applications.
achievements: Developed and deployed 3 ML models with 95% accuracy
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to integrate ML solutions

en.description: Assisted in building and optimizing deep learning models for computer vision tasks.
achievements: Improved model inference speed by 40% through optimization
Contributed to a research paper on object detection
Built data preprocessing pipelines for image classification

ar.description: العمل على تطوير ونشر نماذج التعلم الآلي للتطبيقات الواقعية.

ar.description: المساعدة في بناء وتحسين نماذج التعلم العميق لمهام الرؤية الحاسوبية.
